meanings.definition: (Star Trek) The surname of Jean-Luc Picard, a fictional character in the Star Trek franchise.
meanings.english_definition: (Star Trek) The surname of Jean-Luc Picard, a fictional character in the Star Trek franchise.

examples.sentence: Jean-Luc Picardi is the captain of the USS Enterprise.
examples.translation: ジャン＝リュック・ピカードは、USSエンタープライズ号の艦長です。
